title: Shop assistants - add new
text: Shop assistants are created by the client themselves in the DdD Admin program. They can log into this on the POS. Only shop assistants with admin rights can create new shop assistants. If the person calling doesn't have access, they need to get a hold of someone in the store who does. 1. Log into the POS and click on the Screen with wrench button. 2. Choose Store and POS and click on "Change this machine only" 3. Click Shop assistants on the left side 4. Fill in ID number (choose one that is not in use), First Name, Last Name and Password. 5. Tick Active, choose language, choose user rights and click add. 6. If the shop does not use passwords, remove the password again (it has to be added the first time or the creation of the shop assistant won't work properly). 7. Scroll to the bottom and click Save. 8. Log out of the POS, type reload in the Shop assistant field and click the green button. 9. If it doesn't work at first, wait about 10 minutes, then try again to log in with the new name.
description:
Shop assistants are created by the client themselves in the DdD Admin program. They can log into this on the POS. Only shop assistants with admin rights can create new shop assistants. If the person calling doesn't have access, they need to get a hold of someone in the store who does. 

  

  1. 1. Log into the POS and click on the Screen with wrench button. 

  

 

  

  1. 2. Choose Store and POS and click on "Change this machine only"

  

  1. 3. Click Shop assistants on the left side 

  

  1. 4. Fill in ID number (choose one that is not in use), First Name, Last Name and Password. 

  

  1. 5. Tick Active, choose language, choose user rights and click add. 

  

  1. 6. If the shop does not use passwords, remove the password again (it has to be added the first time or the creation of the shop assistant won't work properly). 

  

  1. 7. Scroll to the bottom and click Save. 

  

  1. 8. Log out of the POS, type reload in the Shop assistant field and click the green button. 

  

  1. 9. If it doesn't work at first, wait about 10 minutes, then try again to log in with the new name.

title: Shop assistants - can't log in (RIAB - Cecil/SO/CBR)
text: If the shop assistants can't log in (they type in their number and nothing happens), the POS program needs to be restarted through Task Manager. 1. In TeamViewer, under Actions, choose the Send Ctrl-Alt-Delete 2. Choose Task Manager 3. Choose the POS program and click End Task 4. Scroll down to any DdD instances, choose them and click End Task 5. Scroll further down and check if there are any other backgroundprocesse s open called anything with POS in them and shut them down too (there's usually ony 1). 6. Close the task manager and restart the POS program. Now they should be able to log in. An alternative, that the customer can perform themselves, is to shut down the PC, leave it off for about 30 seconds, and then turn it back on. That works too.
description:
If the shop assistants can't log in (they type in their number and nothing happens), the POS program needs to be restarted through Task Manager. 

  

  1. 1. In TeamViewer, under Actions, choose the Send Ctrl-Alt-Delete 

  

 

  

  

  1. 2. Choose Task Manager 

  

 

  

  1. 3. Choose the POS program and click End Task 

  

 

  

  

  1. 4. Scroll down to any DdD instances, choose them and click End Task 

  

 

  

  1. 5. Scroll further down and check if there are any other backgroundprocesse s open called anything with POS in them and shut them down too (there's usually ony 1). 

  

  1. 6. Close the task manager and restart the POS program. 

  

Now they should be able to log in. 

  

An alternative, that the customer can perform themselves, is to shut down the PC, leave it off for about 30 seconds, and then turn it back on. That works too.

title: Shop assistants - rigths - german customers (Street One/Cecil/CBR)
text: If Street One / Cecil have issues with shop assistants rights, this needs to be checked in three places. 1. On the POS 2. On BO under Verkäufer (Sales Assistants) 3. On BO under Systembenutzer (Systemusers) Al three need to have the same number. Issues could be that they cannot accept transfers. This usually means that they don't have a system user setup in BO. Simply create a systemuser with the right name and connect it to the sales assistant number.
description:
If Street One / Cecil have issues with shop assistants rights, this needs to be checked in three places. 

  

  1. 1. On the POS 

  1. 2. On BO under Verkäufer (Sales Assistants) 

  1. 3. On BO under Systembenutzer (Systemusers) 

  

Al three need to have the same number. 

  

Issues could be that they cannot accept transfers. This usually means that they don't have a system user setup in BO. Simply create a systemuser with the right name and connect it to the sales assistant number.
